title: Second Course Linear Alg
description: This course will cover important topics in linear algebra not usually discussed in a first-semester course, featuring a mixture of theory and applications.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 1502 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1512 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1522 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1553 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X54 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1554 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1564 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X53 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T
